title: Safely remove a file (Dry Run)
description: Use the rm command to remove the file 'data/to_be_deleted.txt'. The system is in dry-run mode for 'rm', so no files will actually be deleted.

setup_files.content: This is a temporary file for the rm dry-run task.

input_details.prompt_for_command: Enter the rm command to remove 'data/to_be_deleted.txt':

evaluation.expected_stdout: Dry run: This command would have removed: data/to_be_deleted.txt

hints: Use the 'rm' command followed by the path to the file.
The system will tell you what it *would* do, without actually deleting anything.
